favourites.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
favourites.instructions: 1. Boil water and cook spaghetti. 2. In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic. 3. Add tomato sauce and simmer. 4. Serve over cooked spaghetti.
favourites.ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Onion, Garlic, Tomato sauce, Salt, Pepper

favourites.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta

favourites.ingredients: Pasta, Chicken breast, Cream, Parmesan cheese, Butter, Salt, Pepper

favourites.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
favourites.instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry. 3. Season with soy sauce and serve.
favourites.ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms), Soy sauce, Oil
